name: Padded Arming Cap, Black
description: This medieval black arming cap for medieval helmet padding was worn as added defense under the helmet. This one size gambeson for the head gives an authentic look to your costume and can be worn alone as part of your costume.

name: Padded Arming Cap, Beige
description: This medieval beige arming cap for medieval helmet padding was worn as added defense under the helmet. This one size gambeson for the head gives an authentic look to your costume and can be worn alone as part of your costume.

name: RFB Neck and Shoulders, Beige
description: The Ready For Battle padded Gambeson neck and steel shoulders gives a medieval appearance while granting the fighter some protection during epic Larp battles. The two steel pauldrons detach if need be, allowing you the possibility combining them to you existing armor or if you just need the padding. You will enjoy the simple yet practical purpose of this...

name: RFB Neck and Shoulders, Black
description: Every warrior has a beginning and the RFB padded neck and shoulders is just that. Combining padding and armor is not new, but the added protection of small plates on the shoulder with the usefulness of a padded gorget is simply fantastic. Wear  the padding alone beneath heavier armor or combined for a simple more period look, either way you will look good.

name: RFB Padded Mantle, Beige
description: The RFB beige mantle can be worn alone as a decorative element or worn beneath your armor as padding. Light and comfortable it can enhance your costume while providing some protection.

name: RFB Padded Mantle, Black
description: The RFB black mantle can be worn alone as a decorative element or worn beneath your armor as padding. Light and comfortable it can enhance your costume while providing some protection.

name: Imperial Gambeson, Beige
description: The beige Imperial Gambeson  is a tapered padded under-amor that fully protects and prepares you for battle.  Several ties can be found on the shoulders, arms and waist allowing you to secure your armor plating. The intricate stitching greatly reinforces this padded armor and the detachable sleeves allow you to wear it as a padded vest.

name: Imperial Gambeson, Black
description: The black Imperial Gambeson  is a tapered padded under-amor that fully protects and prepares you for battle.  Several ties can be found on the shoulders, arms and waist allowing you to secure your armor plating. The intricate stitching greatly reinforces this padded armor and the detachable sleeves allow you to wear it as a padded vest.

name: Ratio Tunic
description: This piece of fantasy clothing is a perfect cross between a gambeson and a tunic. The padded shoulder and the combination of red and black is ideal for any fighter. Light weight but visually appealing this gambeson is ideal for someone who wants to be different.

name: RFB Padded Armor, White and Brown
description: This  3/4 length Padded Armor can be worn as everyday period wear but was intended to soften blows as under armor padding.  Serving as a base protection this sleeveless gambeson features lace tie closures along the sides and make a key look to any armour.

name: RFB Padded Armour, Black
description: This  3/4 length Padded Armor can be worn as everyday period wear but was intended to soften blows as under armor padding.  Serving as a base protection this sleeveless gambeson features lace tie closures along the sides and make a key look to any armour.

name: Gambeson Arms, Black
description: These medieval gambeson arms are the perfect under padding for medieval gauntlets or arm guards and was worn as added defense. This one size arm padding gives an authentic look to your costume and can be worn alone as part of your costume.

name: Gambeson Arms, Beige
description: These medieval gambeson arms are the perfect under padding for medieval gauntlets or arm guards and was worn as added defense. This one size arm padding gives an authentic look to your costume and can be worn alone as part of your costume.

name: RFB Gambeson, Black
description: The black RFB gambeson is an under padding that no squire should go without.  Made to be worn under armor to protect against pinching or bruising from the armor parts this gambeson comes in one size and was intended for larp use.  This gambeson has short sleeves attached to the body with large ventilation holes for comfort....

name: RFB Gambeson, Brown
description: The brown RFB gambeson is an under padding that no squire should go without.  Made to be worn under armor to protect against pinching or bruising from the armor parts this gambeson comes in one size and was intended for larp use.  This gambeson has short sleeves attached to the body with large ventilation holes for comfort....

name: Warrior Gambeson, Black
description: The black warrior gambeson is a piece of arming that no knight should go without.  Made to be worn under armor to protect against pinching or bruising from the armor parts this gambeson was intended for larp use.  The arms and shoulders have a thicker layer of padding and provides extra protection where needed....

name: Warrior Gambeson, Brown
description: The Brown warrior gambeson is a piece of arming that no knight should go without.  Made to be worn under armor to protect against pinching or bruising from the armor parts this gambeson was intended for larp use.  The arms and shoulders have a thicker layer of padding and provides extra protection where needed....

name: Gambeson Legs, Black
description: The medieval gambeson legs are the perfect under padding for shin guards and greaves and were worn as added defense. This one size leg padding gives an authentic look to your costume and can be worn alone as part of your costume.

name: Gambeson Legs, Beige
description: The medieval gambeson legs are the perfect under padding for shin guards and greaves and were worn as added defense. This one size leg padding gives an authentic look to your costume and can be worn alone as part of your costume.

name: Aramis Doublet, Dark Red
description: This elegant arming doublet gives a snug tapered fit designed to be worn beneath armor. This Tudor styled gambeson is constructed from layers of wool and satin giving it an authentic renaissance look.
